document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 45''' was released in January/February of 1994. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Magic.Spells:
''[[alter self]]'' • ''[[bind]]'' • ''[[Cantrip (spell)|cantrip]]'' • ''[[clairaudience]]'' • ''[[color spray]]'' • ''[[detect magic]]'' • ''[[fool's gold]]'' • ''[[identify]]'' • ''[[Leomund's tiny hut]]'' • ''[[light]]'' • ''[[magic mouth]]'' • ''[[Nystul's magic aura]]'' • ''[[phantasmal force]]'' • ''[[phantom steed]]'' • ''[[shatter]]'' • ''[[spook]]'' • ''[[tongues]]'' • ''[[ventriloquism]]''
